body:
# selector-no-id

Disallow id selectors.

    #foo {}
/** ↑
 * This type of selector */

The following patterns are considered warnings:

#foo {}

.bar > #foo {}

#foo.bar {}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a {}

.foo {}

[foo] {}
rawBody:
# selector-no-id

Disallow id selectors.

```css
    #foo {}
/** ↑
 * This type of selector */
```

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
#foo {}
```

```css
.bar > #foo {}
```

```css
#foo.bar {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a {}
```

```css
.foo {}
```

```css
[foo] {}
```
raw:
---
title: selector-no-id
---

# selector-no-id

Disallow id selectors.

```css
    #foo {}
/** ↑
 * This type of selector */
```

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
#foo {}
```

```css
.bar > #foo {}
```

```css
#foo.bar {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a {}
```

```css
.foo {}
```

```css
[foo] {}
```
